contents.text: Tandoozy's food is made by us from fresh and high-quality, individual ingredients.
Our food is spiced, but not 'spicy' - but if you like it hot, we have cayenne on-site for your pleasure!

contents.text: We serve only halal chicken.
Everything is vegan - aside from the chicken.
Everything is dairy-free
Everything is gluten-free - aside from the naan.

We only make six things: tandoori chicken, red lentil dhal, basmati rice, tikka masala sauce, mango chutney and fresh baked naan bread. We hold it that they are best when eaten together for a balanced meal.

contents.name: Wine
contents.description: Nishino features hand-picked wine from around the world. Focusing on wines from the Pacific Northwest. We are pleased to assist our guests with wine pairing that compliment our renowned cuisine.

contents.name: Sake
contents.description: Our selection showcases the distinctive flavor profiles and regional characteristics of Japan's traditional beverage. Whether you prefer warm, cold, jun-mai, ginjo, or dai-gingo, our knowledgeable staff can assist you in choosing a sake that will enhance your dining experience.

contents.name: A Multi Course Chef's Dinner Featuring the Best of Nishino – Innovative Good Taste and Visual Elegance. Omakase Is Japanese for “Leave It to Me.” Leave It to Our Chef for an Unforgettable Meal. Reservations Are Recommended in Advance for the Omakase Dinners. Minimum Two Orders.

contents.text: We specialize in pizza made in the neapolitan tradition. Our pizza dough is made in house, we use only premium italian flour & san Marzano tomatoes, as well as gourmet toppings you can't find anywhere else.
Pizzas are 12" & traditionally served for the individual. Our crust is very thin w/ a light smattering of toppings.

contents.name: Kokuryu "Black Dragon" Junmai Ginjo

contents.name: Kanbara "Bride of the Fox" Junmai Ginjo

contents.name: Miyasaka

contents.name: Toryu "Rising Dragon" Tokubestu Junmai
contents.description: Tochigi /+4/ Yamada Nishiki. Fennel and flowers on the nose, with a rich, nutty, and ricey palate. A very fresh finish. Food friendly.

contents.name: Kasumi Tsuru Kimoto Extra Dry
contents.description: Hyogo / +5 / Gohyakumangoku. Notes of roasted nuts, shiitake mushrooms and dried fruit with a crisp finish.

contents.name: Tozai "Living Jewel"
contents.description: Fushimi, Kyoto/ +6.5/ Koshihikari. Clean and smooth with flavors of banana and candy wafer. Dry and soft.

contents.name: Joto Daiginjo

contents.name: Nanbu Bijin 'Shinpaku' Junmai Daiginjo

contents.name: Takatenjin "Soul of the Sensei" Junmai Daiginjo
contents.description: Shizuoka /+5/ Yamadanishiki. Aromas of clean honeydew rind, grainy rice with a touch of earth. While spicy honeydew and dry anise dominate up front, the finish is dry with good spicy white pepper and jasmine notes

contents.name: Dassai 23 "Otter Festival"
contents.description: Yamaguchi‎ / +4 / Yamadanishiki. Vibrant and fresh with creamy pistachio notes layered with sweet melon and apple. Soft and silky body that finishes clean.

contents.name: Dassai Beyond & Dassi 23
contents.description: Yamaguchi. As the name implies this sake goes beyond the traditional brewing methods to create the ultimate sake. The milling rate and brewing process is kept a secret but President Sakurai provides a suggestion, then move on to the Beyond. By doing so, the unique features of the Beyond will become clear

contents.text: Pairs with spiced food or on its own as a dessert sake

contents.name: Tedorigawa "Gold Blossoms" Daihinjo
contents.description: Ishikawa /+6/ Yamada Nishiki, Gohyakumangoku. Full, clean taste, with a nice balance of sweetness and acidity overlaying a delicate fruitiness. Vivid and poised.

contents.name: Seikyo Omachi Junmai Ginjo
contents.description: Hiroshima /+3/ Omachi. Bright and bursting with notes of ripe watermelon, mango and citrus. Well balanced with a rounded flavor and a clean acidity.

contents.name: Calista Pinot Noir
contents.description: 2012 The Coast Range, CA. Rhubarb, cherry and cranberry notes flow through the palate to a balanced and lengthy finish of mixed dark fruit and black tea.

contents.description: 2011 Walla Walla, WA. This elegant Bordeaux blend is dark and sultry with abundant ripe raspberries throughout.

contents.name: Inglenook Cabernet Sauvignon
contents.description: 2009 Napa Valley. Pronounced aromas of dried cherries and coffee precede the rich flavors of black fruits and hints of licorice and spice.

contents.name: Macrina Casera
contents.description: “Of This House”.This bread is leavened with a natural wild starter made from organic grapes, coarse whole wheat and unbleached flours. Designed for any meal. It has a mild sour flavor

contents.name: Sour White
contents.description: Made with organic hard red winter wheat. This loaf’s full sour flavor is developed from a natural wild starter. Perfect with seafood

contents.name: Giuseppe
contents.description: Our classic, crusty Italian loaf. Leavened with biga (traditional sponge starter) and unbleached flour. Lighter in salt and perfect for dipping in your favorite olive oil

contents.name: Fresh Herb Baguette
contents.description: Enhanced with fresh herbs and extra virgin olive oil, topped with coarse sea salt. Great with seafood and salads

contents.name: Macrina Baguette
contents.description: Available every afternoon. Our version of a french baguette. Perfect with our savory spreads

contents.name: Ciabatta
contents.description: This “Italian slipper bread” is great for sandwiches or sliced for bruschetta. Moist and chewy with the addition of extra virgin olive oil and whole milk

contents.name: Rustic Potato
contents.description: A favorite at the bakery. Made with unpeeled russet potatoes, unbleached flour, yeast and extra virgin olive oil. It has an exceptional shelf life and is perfect for sandwiches

contents.name: Olivetta
contents.description: Similar in texture to our focaccia, this moist and savory loaf is packed with whole green olives and fresh oregano. Baked on semolina and brushed with extra virgin olive oil

contents.name: Greek Olive Bread
contents.description: Made with a sour starter and a small addition of organic rye flour and lemon zest. It is packed full of Kalamata olives

contents.name: Vollkorn
contents.description: A German-style, 6-grain seed bread. This beautiful loaf is leavened with a beer starter and sweetened with a touch of honey and molasses. Its braided design makes it perfect for breaking with friends

contents.name: Brioche
contents.description: A classic french pan loaf enriched with butter. Light and velvety in texture, this bread is excellent toasted or for french toast

contents.name: Raisin Brioche Twist
contents.description: Our moist Brioche dough with the addition of plump raisins. The pieces are braided together with a blend of sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. A breakfast sensation

contents.name: Crostini
contents.description: Thinly sliced bread brushed with olive oil and toasted. A great alternative to crackers

contents.name: Oatmeal Buttermilk Bread
contents.description: Our version of an old fashioned favorite. This pan baked loaf is perfect for sandwiches or toast and has a slightly sweet finish. Available whole or sliced

contents.name: Whole Wheat Cider
contents.description: This pan baked loaf combines organic whole wheat flour, toasted sesame seeds, wheat berries, apple cider and honey. An excellent choice for sandwiches or toast

contents.name: Wheat Herb Walnut
contents.description: A mild‏ sour, wheat dough with roasted walnuts and fresh hand-picked herbs. Great with soups, cheeses and fruit

contents.name: Rye
contents.description: Our version of the classic. A must for sandwiches or with your favorite cheeses

contents.name: Challah
contents.description: We have been told our braided loaf is the best in town. Available plain, with poppy seeds or in crown shape for rosh hashanah 1.25 lb Loaf

contents.name: Blackburn Wheat
contents.description: This slightly sweet whole-grain loaf is a vegan bread. It is sweetened with agave syrup instead of honey

contents.name: Pane Francese
contents.description: Literally frenchman’s bread in italian, this loaf harmonizes the best of French and Italian breads into one unique loaf. Shaped like a classic french baguette, this long loaf has a lot of crust and a light airy texture with a slightly sour flavor. Our pane francese combines shepherd’s grain whole wheat Flour, unbleached flour and our Loaf

contents.name: Apricot Nut
contents.description: Our light sour dough with dried, unsulphured turkish apricots, roasted walnuts and pecans. Slightly sweet. Perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack with soft cheeses and fruit

contents.name: Cinnamon Monkey Bread
contents.description: Our wonderful morning bread made from dough enriched with eggs and butter. At the heart of this loaf is a delicious swirl of apple butter and cinnamon sugar

contents.name: Focaccia
contents.description: This hearth bread is made by traditional methods using extra virgin olive oil, unbleached flour, semolina and kosher salt. Great as a slice or for sandwiches. Available as an oval loaf or in a half sheet pan size traditional or topped with herbs

contents.name: Sardinian Flatbread
contents.description: Cracker bread made from semolina flour, olive oil and fresh rosemary. After baking, the pieces are brushed with olive oil and sprinkled with sea salt. Break it apart and dip into our fabulous spreads

contents.name: Seeded Breadsticks
contents.description: A great addition to any bread basket. Great with soups 0.65 each

contents.description: A deep chocolate cake layered with bittersweet chocolate pot de crème and guinness mousse. Glazed in bittersweet chocolate ganache.

contents.text: Individual tartlets, various cakes, pies and tarts are available by the slice

contents.name: Whisper Cake
contents.description: Our popular white chocolate cake is layered with lemon curd, whipped cream, fresh raspberries and raspberry preserves. Finished with white chocolate cream cheese frosting

contents.name: Tuxedo Cake
contents.description: A bittersweet chocolate cake moistened with brandy syrup with alternating layers of ganache and white chocolate buttercream. It is frosted with white chocolate cream cheese buttercream topped with chocolate curls

contents.description: A fresh‏ lemon butter cake layered with lemon curd lightened with whipped cream, fresh strawberries and fresh strawberry preserves frosted with lemon buttercream. Sides are dusted with biscotti crumbles

contents.description: A moist coconut cake layered with rum roasted pineapple, sweetened whipped cream and frosted with a white chocolate cream cheese buttercream and toasted coconut

contents.name: Carrot Cake
contents.description: An old fashioned favorite made with fresh carrots and toasted walnuts. Filled and frosted with a cream cheese buttercream plus a sprinkle of orange zest between layering. It is finished with toasted walnuts and candied carrot peel

contents.name: Mom’s Chocolate Cake
contents.description: Our version of an old fashioned devil’s food chocolate cake frosted with chocolate buttercream. This is a real crowd pleaser

contents.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Cake
contents.description: Our fresh lemon butter cake studded with poppy seeds and layered with lemon curd lightened with whipped cream and fresh seasonal fruit, frosted with lemon cream cheese buttercream

contents.description: A favorite‏ at Macrina. A moist cocoa powder and buttermilk cake frosted with white chocolate cream cheese icing

contents.name: Lemon Tart
contents.description: Our popular version of a traditional lemon chess pie decorated with seasonal fresh fruit and white chocolate curls. This is our signature tart

contents.description: A classic‏ custard filling made with low-fat yogurt topped with seasonal fresh fruit and toasted nuts.7” Tart, serves 4-6

contents.description: An Italian lattice-top tart made with our sesame almond pastry crust and filled with fresh seasonal fruit. Delicious with whipped cream or ice cream10” Tart, serves 10-12

contents.description: A free-form tart made with our flaky pie dough packed with seasonal fruit and topped with crystal sugar. We recommend serving warm and a la mode9” Tart, serves 8-10

contents.description: An elegant country tart with a rosette of thinly sliced apples on top of a filling of sweet and tart oven-roasted Washington apples.10” Tart, serves 10-12

contents.description: Traditional picture‏ perfect double crust pie filled with ripe seasonal fruits. Made with our flaky pie dough and topped with superfine sugar.9” Tart

contents.description: An Italian sponge tart in a walnut crust with pine nuts, raisins and citrus zest topped with a rosette of seasonal fruit.10” Tart, serves 10-12

contents.description: Our beautiful five-layer almond cake moistened with almond syrup with alternating layers of mocha buttercream and bittersweet chocolate ganache.

contents.name: Banana Cake
contents.description: Gluten-free with one layer of chocolate cake sandwiched between two layers of banana cake with rum-roasted bananas and whipped cream. It is topped with a glaze of rich bittersweet chocolate ganache

contents.name: German Chocolate Cake
contents.description: Traditional chocolate moistened with rum syrup layered with mocha buttercream and coconut walnut filling. Beatutifully decorated with mocha buttercream and and coconut walnut topping.

contents.name: Passion Fruit Cake
contents.description: Rich white chocolate cake with passion fruit Bavarian cream and fresh raspberry preserves. Frosted beautifully with passion fruit buttercream

contents.name: Torta Gianduja
contents.description: A gluten-free six-layer rectangular torta with alternating layers of a chocolate espresso cake and chocolate hazelnut cake glazed with a rich bittersweet chocolate ganache and decorated with hazelnuts. This torta is so decadent you only need to serve thin slices.Serves 8-10

contents.text: Laredos grill features tex mex & regional mexican cuisine. Rustic meats cooked over mesquite & classics like great quesadillas & enchiladas. Plenty of vegatarian options. Our house specilties include our carne asada plate & tacos al pastor.

This northern mexican food is “cowboy-like” – very rustic & mesquite-grilled. The carne asada is our specialty & the prices are very affordable. Platos grandes entrees start at $9.50 & go up to $17.95.
Make any enchilada deluxe style! Topped w/ lettuce, guacamole, pico, queso fresco & sour cream: +2

contents.text: Taking cue’s from some of the classic sandwiches we all love, we’ve tried to take these sandwiches to the next level with super fresh cut ingredients and a few little additions to the recipes. We even let you choose your bread. Don’t forget to add a salad or side to make this into the perfect meal.

contents.text: Our salads are not playing second string to any burger on our menu. Want to take your meal to the next level with a side salad or looking to make some greens into a whole meal? Our salads keep up with everything we serve, made with the best and most fresh ingredients we can find.

contents.text: The trick to making a great side dish is keeping an eye on the details. Things like hand cutting fries and getting the freshest ingredients go a very long way. We make sure everything we serve is sourced and prepared the best we know how.

contents.text: We are happy to accommodate our gluten free customers whenever possible. To help us serve you best, please be sure to tell us you are gluten-free when you order, so we can help you make choices so you can dine safely!

contents.text: Shakes any flavor except malt. The shake machine is susceptible to cross contamination from malt powder and any shakes of the month containing glutinous products.

contents.text: Cosi si mangia la pizza a napoli – just like eating pizza in naples

The name of the pizzeria, pulcinella (pul chee’nel la) is a character from the 17th century Italian commedia dell’arte that is widely recognized as the symbol of naples. the culture demonstrated in the pizzeria represents the passion pulcinella & neapolitans have for food, wine & life.

contents.text: Pizzeria pulcinella is proud to be member No. 304 of the associazione verace pizza napoletana, avpn. the association certifies members from around the world provided they are able to produce a product that meets their high standards. the avpn performs rigorous, periodic checks on all of its members to ensure they are using superior Italian products & are following the traditional methods.

The consistency of “pizza napoletana” is tender & elastic allowing for easy cutting or folding. expect a taste typical of freshly baked bread w/ the savory flavors of the Italian tomatoes, fresh mozzarella & basil. buon appetito!

contents.text: At Poquitos we strive to present authentic Mexican cuisine prepared with ingredients that are the best of both worlds- outstanding local sourcing for our meats and produce; unique and direct sourcing for items essential to honoring the culinary traditions of Mexico.

Our menu features handmade tortillas rolled and pressed from fresh masa, guacamole made to order only from fresh avocados, and classic presentations of Oaxacan mole negro, Mexico City-inspired tacos al pastor, coastal ceviche as well as many other seasonal and uniquely Mexican dishes.

contents.text: (A bit messy to eat, but worth it)

At poquitos we strive to present authentic mexican cuisine prepared with ingredients that are the best of both worlds- outstanding local sourcing for our meats and produce; unique and direct sourcing for items essential to honoring the culinary traditions of mexico.Our menu features handmade tortillas rolled and pressed from fresh masa, guacamole made to order only from fresh avocados, and classic presentations of oaxacan mole negro, mexico city-inspired tacos al pastor, coastal ceviche as well as many other seasonal and uniquely mexican dishes.

contents.text: Our hand-pressed burgers are made from ground beef that is fresh ground daily at Don and Joe’s Meats located in the Pike Place Market. We hand press our ½ pound burgers to order which allows the burger to retain its natural juices and results in a thick, flavorful, and moist burger for you to enjoy. We then top it off with the appropriate condiments and serve it on a fresh baked burger bun from Grand Central Bakery. Since we serve burgers that are a half pound of thick and flavorful goodness, please allow for additional time for us to cook it perfect for you.

contents.text: Hot sandwiches take 15 minutes to prepare.
Served w/ your choice of soup, winter caesar salad, tex mex salad, or house side salad. Available á la carte for $3 less.

contents.name: Lentil Burger
contents.description: Seattle’s best veggie burger is accentuated by our delectable special sauce & served on a grilled potato roll w/ vegenaise, marinated onions, cucumber, sprouts & bread & butter pickles.

contents.name: Mighty Mofo
contents.description: Our take on a reuben sandwich w/ house made seitan, sauerkraut, mustard, cucumbers, & sprouts. Served on sourdough.

contents.name: Artichoke Melt
contents.description: Flavorful artichoke pate, cashew cheese & vegenaise grilled on sourdough bread, topped w/ cucumbers & sprouts.

contents.name: Avocado Sandwich
contents.description: Simple pleasures! Avocado, cucumber, marinated onions, sprouts & vegenaise on sourdough bread.

contents.name: Thc
contents.description: Perfect for satisfying the munchies, a wheat roll w/ house made garlicky hummus, smoked paprika tempeh bacon, vegenaise, cucumbers & sprouts.

contents.name: Roasted Beet Sandwich
contents.description: Savory red beet & crimini mushroom pate grilled w/ cashew cheese on a fluffy wheat roll. Finished w/ marinated onions & fresh spinach.

contents.text: Please let us know about any serious allergies you may have, as not all ingredients are listed here. Thanks!
Some of our sandwiches are available gluten free *by request only*: artichoke, avocado, thc, roasted beet
All salads are gluten-free

contents.text: Samurai Noodle has concocted a few deilcious dishes that were introduced as daily specials in 2010. They have gotten so much attention since then that they are now available daily We will continue featuring one of our specials every day for 7.25, but all of them will be available daily for 8.80.

contents.description: Whole dungeness crab. Each crab weighs between 1.75 and 2 pounds. A distinctive sweet flavor, bright orange shell color, and tender, flaky white meat. Alaska dungeness crab is a festive dish, classically served whole, either hot or cold, and paired with melted butter or dipping sauces. An excellent source of protein!

contents.name: 4 Lbs. Mussels (Serves Four)
contents.description: Mussels in the shell - a fun, interesting hors d'oeuvre for your family or a special gathering. Great to serve steamed with butter and bread, or add spices to create a tasty broth.

contents.name: 4 Lbs. Manila Clams (Serves Four)
contents.description: Manila clams are a tender clam, perfectly bite-sized for a starter to any meal. Price is per pound (15-20 clams per pound)

contents.name: One Dozen Quilcene Oysters
contents.description: From the clear, pristine, waters of hood canal, washington. Our oyster farmer has been hand farming these oysters for the past twenty years, growing them specifically to serve on the half shell. The taste is reminscent of the water itself--clean, clear, with a hint of salt. Price is per dozen.

contents.name: 1 Lbs Alder Smoked King Salmon
contents.description: Jack's specialty! Smoked daily in the basement of pike place market, jack has spent the last twenty years perfecting his brine. The salmon is the perfect combination of smoky and sweet, with a tender, flakey consistency. This hearty piece will make a great hors d' oeurve served with crackers and cream cheese. Also wonderful tossed in pasta or folded into an omelet!

contents.text: Fresh fish and seafood specials available for local pickup at our west seattle location, or order online with overnight delivery

contents.name: Dungeness and King Crab Special
contents.description: this is for the die hard crab lover the best of both crab worlds, you get 5 cooked dungeness crab and 5 lbs of jumbo king crab legs. all you need for the perfect feast is your favorite cocktail sauce, crackers, seafood forks and a bucket of lemons, perfect Sunday game day feast, as always, we will happily clean your dungeness crab for you free. when this crab feast arrives, simply steam the king crab is an inch of water for 5-6 min, the dungeness are good to go, overnight shipping to your door included

contents.name: Wild King Salmon Fillet Special
contents.description: 5 lbs of troll caught king salmon fillet, the filet-mignon of seafood, wild king salmon has the highest omega 3 oil content and the most velvety texture of all wild pacific salmons, it’s versatility lends itself to grilling, broiling, poaching, roasting, steaming and smoking, you choose your favorite cooking technique with this special fish, the flavor is rich and distinctive, overnight shipping included

contents.name: Halibut Fillet Special
contents.description: 5 lbs of halibut fillet, the firm white meat and delicately sweet flavor of halibut, combined with its high nutritional value, make it a favorite among fish lovers, alaskan halibut is the world’s premium white fish, fresh halibut is in season until mid-November, order this special before the season ends, overnight shipping included

contents.name: Salmon Cakes, Halibut Cakes and Dungeness Crab Cakes Special
contents.description: Cakes, cakes, cakes, this one is a crowd pleaser. Your family or guests can sample all of our seafood cakes, includes 5 salmon cakes, 5 halibut cakes, and of course 5 of our dungeness crab cakes, this special also includes our avocado oil, this oil has an extremely high smoke point so you can brown and sear your cakes to perfection, overnight shipping is included

contents.name: Two Sockeye Salmon Special
contents.description: We call this one “two socks in a box.” about 10-12 lbs of a whole sockeye salmon, we will fillet or steak for you (your choice) or leave it whole. The wild sockeye salmon, like the king salmon and coho salmon, is one of the healthiest fish in the world, one of the most abundant salmon with a deep red, firm flesh, and a rich flavor. Great for a bigger holiday gathering. Remember, you can easily freeze this fish to eat at a later time, also makes a fabulous holiday gift overnight shipping included

contents.name: Sockeye Salmon Special
contents.description: About 5-6 lbs of a whole sockeye salmon, we will fillet or steak for you your choice or leave it whole. The wild sockeye salmon, like the king salmon and coho salmon, is one of the healthiest fish in the world, one of the most abundant salmon with a deep red, firm flesh, and a rich flavor, this is our most popular gift during the holiday season, overnight shipping included to you or the lucky recipient

contents.name: Smoked Salmon Special
contents.description: 3 lbs of alder smoked salmon we smoke our own salmon in house, owner Jon daniels has been at this for 17 years, a recipe handed down from his father, La land, who was a fishing legend in southeast Alaska, our smoked salmon sells out daily in the store, if you want a truly impressive appetizer this is it, two day shipping included in this one

contents.name: Mini Dungeness Crab Cakes Special
contents.description: New mini crab cakes are two bites each about 1 ounce and contain delicious dungeness crab mixed up in our famous recipe, this special includes 24 mini crab cakes at a fantastic price

contents.name: Copper River Salmon Fillet
contents.description: copper river wild salmon journey up the most rugged wild salmon run anywhere-th pristine copper river in Alaska, the salmon must store extra fat and oils in order to make this long journey. this high fat and oil content is why copper river wild salmon are the best tasting and highest quality salmon available

contents.text: Fresh fish and seafood products available in our west seattle local store, or order online with overnight delivery

contents.name: Black tiger prawn - shell-on XL 16/20 ct
Cioppino Seafood Special
contents.description: A northwest favorite comfort food, just what you need for the perfect hearty fall/winter meal. Includes 2 lbs clams, 2 lbs mussels, 1 lb medium shrimp, 1 lb of halibut fillet, 1 lb of sea scallops and two jars of our seattle fish company cioppino sauce, this seafood stew serves 6-8, great idea for a simple holiday dinner party meal that looks like you’ve been cooking all day,

contents.name: Copper River Salmon Fillet
contents.description: Copper river wild salmon journey up the most rugged wild salmon run anywhere-th pristine copper river in Alaska, the salmon must store extra fat and oils in order to make this long journey, this high fat and oil content is why copper river wild salmon are the best tasting and highest quality salmon available

contents.name: Dungeness and King Crab Special
contents.description: This is for the die hard crab lover the best of both crab worlds, you get 5 cooked dungeness crab and 5 lbs of jumbo king crab legs, all you need for the perfect feast is your favorite cocktail sauce, crackers, seafood forks and a bucket of lemons, perfect sunday game day feast, as always, we will happily clean your dungeness crab for you free, when this crab feast arrives, simply steam the king crab is an inch of water for 5-6 min, the dungeness are good to go,

contents.name: Dungeness Crab Special
contents.description: Includes 5 fresh cooked jumbo dungeness crab, our dungeness crab come from the waters of Puget sound, we are proud to carry this local northwest specialty, these crabs make a great meal with plenty of meat in the body and legs, the flavor is sweet and buttery with a slight firmness, they are at your door overnight and shipping is included, and of course we clean them for free

contents.name: Ekone fresh shucked oysters
contents.description: At Ekone, we use strictly farm raised pacific oysters for our shucked products. oysters are harvested from Willapa bay and brought to our processing facility in bay center, wa, our facility stores the live oysters in our shell-stock coolers at 45° f, oysters are shucked and then the meats are washed in refrigerated water, the meats are sorted by hand for size and quality

contents.name: Halibut Fillet Special

contents.name: King Crab Legs Special
contents.description: 5 lbs of jumbo king crab legs, our Alaskan king crab legs are presented individually, cooked and ready to eat, from the waters of southeast Alaska and the bering sea king crab is the most highly prized of all crab, the flavor is sweet, moist and tender. simply reheat by steaming or grilling and serve with your favorite cocktail sauce or drawn butter

contents.name: 2008 Pinot Gris Cristom (OR)
contents.description: This pale straw colored pinot gris has slightly shy aromas of ripe melons and pears. The straightforward clean ripe fruit flavors are more assertive with nuances of anise and flint. The complete malolactic fermentation helps give this wine a velvety texture yet there is enough acidity left to make this wine a fine foil for a variety of foods, especially seafood. There is also a hint of minerally in the finish perhaps from the Celilo portion of this wine which is a characteristics of that vineyard.

contents.name: 2010 Kamiak White (WA)
contents.description: Composition: 55% chardonnay, 44% sauvignon blanc, 1% Gewurztraminer. This wine is rocking it right from the start with nuances of Meyer lemon, baked apple and spice on the nose. On tasting, one is struck by both the elegant body of the wine and the lively acids sparkling along the sides of the tongue. Flavors of apple, pear, citrus and cardamon fill the palate. This lingering finish is that of a decadent caramel. Pair this wine with porcini mushroom risotto with white truffle oil and halibut. This wine is on the sweeter side.

contents.name: 2010 Chardonnay L'Ecole (WA)
contents.description: This beautifully expressive chardonnay offers an enticing mix of tropical fruit, fresh apple, and characters of flint and slate. The vibrant structure of this wine is finely balanced between richness and minerality adding complexity on the clean, lingering finish.

contents.name: 2009 Semillion L'Ecole, Lowden (WA)
contents.description: Remarkably brilliant with rich fruit and balanced acidity, this wine shows fragrant citrus blossom and honeysuckle aromas, with lemon bar, lychee nut and key-lime expanding on a lingering finish. Try it with a goat cheese appetizers, spicy seafood or your traditional thanksgiving turkey and dressing.

contents.name: '10 Chardonnay Blacksmith (WA)
contents.description: Notes of Asian pears and honeysuckle greet the nose setting the stage for palate of pineapple, stone fruit with hints of citrus. A porch sipper or paired with casual dining of chicken salad sandwiches, chilled prawns and fresh fruit salsas.

contents.name: 2010 Sauvignon Blanc Gordon Brothers (WA)
contents.description: The 2010 Gordon brothers sauvignon blanc is fresh and crisp with flavors of apricot, citrus and pineapple, with an enticing mid palate hint of marschino cherry and almond. Lively acids leave your tongue tingling pleasantly. Make this wine your new favorite picnic wine. Try pairing with grilled chicken and potato salad.

contents.name: Forgeron Waldette White (WA)
contents.description: In the glass it brings to mind lemon peel, fresh cut lime and a touch of white orchid. The mouth feel is crisp and clean with just the right amount of acidity. Spice, citrus and guava gather for an interesting grouping of flavor profiles. Serve our Walldette white wine with crab and a spicy clam chowder or your favorite mac and cheese recipe.

contents.name: '09 Lone Canary Pinot Gris (WA)
contents.description: Bright and crisp, this pinot gris presents well defined flavors of green apple and pear with accents of Meyer lemon and delicious minerality.

contents.name: 2009 Chardonnay Brick House, Newberg (OR)
contents.description: "Lightly and satiny, this white weaves its tobacco-scented pear and Meyer lemon flavors through a refined structure that lets them float through the finish unhindered. Drink now through 2015."

contents.name: 2009 Pinot Blanc "Freedom Hill" St. Innocent (OR)
contents.description: The‎ aromaticof the 2009 pinot blanc have taken on dimensions that i have not previously seen. It usual yellow and white fruit, have expanded to include melon and hints of ginger and salty, coastal air. Floral and tropical fruit flavors are layered with peach, red apple, and cantaloupe with nuances of spice, white flowers, and powdered ginger. It has a lovely mouth filling texture and its flavors linger well into the finish. This vintage finished completely dry. Pinot blanc is perfect with crab cakes, mussels, ceviches, and a wide variety of flavorful appetizers. It is especially good with hors d'oeuvres that are a bit salty and rich. Drink now or over the next two years to enjoy this wine at its peak of freshness.

contents.name: 2010 Andrew Rich Sauvignon Blanc (OR)
contents.description: This sauvignon blanc has the Croft Vineyard's signature notes of pineapple, guava, passion fruit, citrus, and just a hint of gooseberry. It is rich, with complex notes of mineral and fresh spring water in the finish. A perpetual favorite, it sells out quickly. Classic summer sipper, with the sophistication to work well with fine cuisine.

contents.name: 2007 Syrah Ash Hollow (WA)
contents.description: Our‎ 2007 ash hollow estare Syrah is "Old World" in style with a little "New World" attitude! Notes violets, cassis, barnyard, plum, and smoke on the nose. Medium bodied, the intense cherry and blackberry flavors on the front of the palate are balanced with dark chocolate and rich tobacco.

contents.name: 2009 Syrah Balboa (WA)
contents.description: This 100% Syrah from mirage vineyard is all about the fruit, soil and vintage characteristics. Tom Glase is the winemaker at Balboa and is also the winemaker at Beresan in Walla. Here is what he has tasted from his Syrah "This is mirage vineyard Syrah at is best. Sharp cherries followed by rosemary, chocolate, bacon fat and an earthy finish on the palate. Single vineyard grown."

contents.name: 2008 Pinot Noir Henry Estate (OR)
contents.description: It's a beautiful pale-scarlet color, fresh, fruity and vibrant on the palate, and is the perfect red to drink slightly chilled this steamy season. Its not a serious wine, not a wine to be pondered and discussed, but a pretty, fresh quaffer packed with the essence of strawberries and rose petals. It even manages a hint of gravelly minerality, a surprising bonus in a wine at this price.

contents.name: 2008 Merlot Milbrandit (WA)
contents.description: "Smooth and round, brimming with cherry and tocacco flavors, a savory edge adding depth to the open-textured freshness. Drink now through 2014."

contents.name: 2009 Sangiovese Cavatappi (WA)
contents.description: This has the character of a good, villages-level Beaujolais, light in body but heavy on red fruit freshness, with some mineral, spice, and herb to keep things interesting.

contents.name: 2008 Cabernet Weather Report (WA)
contents.description: Black currant, black raspberries, black and red cherries, herbs, pepper and a hint of toast and earth. New vintage.

contents.name: 2008 Pendulum Bed (WA)
contents.description: Black plums and herbs show on the nose with bits of black pepper and vanilla highlights. The palate continues with black plums and pepper accompanied by black cherry and hints of leather and tar notes. The supple tanninis and good acidity give wine good structure and hold the finish for quite a while.

contents.name: A to Z Chemin de Terre Bed (OR)
contents.description: The opening bouquet of this deeply-colored, brilliantly garnet wine from the rogue valley is full of berries (boysenberries, blackberries, and raspberries), Bing cherries, coffee, cocoa and tobacco. With aeration, aroma of plums, pepper, truffles, minerals and cedar emerge. In the mouth, the succulent flavors mirror the aromatics without compromising the wine's serious nature.

contents.name: Cadence "Coda" Red Mountain (WA)
contents.description: Red mountain 35% cabernet sauvignon, 31% merlot 25% cabernet franc, 6% petit verdot. The nose leads with black fruit, baking spice, earth and plums. These are echoed on the palate, along with minerality and a broader spectrum of red fruit and great, balanced acidity. The tannins are present, perhaps firmer than in years past, but broad, sweet and fine.

contents.name: 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon L'Ecole (WA)
contents.description: This is 100% cabernet sauvignon from an all-star collection of Walla Walla vineyards. It sows excellent structure and depth, with plenty of herbal character. The black fruits are abundant, spicy and sharp; this is a young wine from a great vintage than needs more bottle age. The layering though still tight and compact, suggests that with cellaring this will evolve into Bordeaux-like complexity, with a mix of herb, mineral, leaf and berry flavors. The barrel flavors (40% new) are subtle and elegant.

contents.name: 2009 Evening Land Pinot Noir (OR)
contents.description: It's‎ packed with dense, slightly firm fruit that offers up black / blue fruits, pretty acidity, and tons of character.

contents.name: 2006 Pinot Noir Ferris Wheel Brandborg (OR)
contents.description: This wine is a lovely brilliant garnet color. The aromas and bouquet show a complex mix of strawberry fruit, mushrooms, earth and sweet oak. The mouthfeel is round and full, tann is well integrated into the whole impression.

contents.name: 2008 Gramache Boulder Red (WA)
contents.description: Boulder red, our only varietal blend, is a smooth and approachable red blend layered with depth and complexity that can be enjoyed with a wide range of foods or all by itself.

contents.name: 2009 Beast Red (WA)
contents.description: Our 2009 wildebest combines poise and power, with suave tannins, perfumed aromatics and a plush, creamy texture. In the nose and on the palate, the Syrah contributes big beautiful licorice and ripe black cherry notes, with the cabernet adding richness and the malbec bringing high-tone raspberry and red fruit elements to the blend. Throughout it all, the lush fruit surrounds a core of sleek Washington state acidity that adds length and definition to this handsome beast.

contents.name: 2005 Nebbiolo 'Maddalena' Cavatappi (WA)
contents.description: Textbook varietal characteristics of sweet licorice and roses on the nose, with a rich melange of dark cherries and plums that gush through the finish. This is drinking beautifully right now, and pairs very well with any hearty winter dish.

contents.name: 2006 Syrah Beresan (WA)
contents.description: Beresan‎ 2006 Syrah is a big fruity red wine with berry notes of raspberry and blueberry and traditional earthy and gamey components. This is a wine that has a silky feel, soft tannins, and a long finish.

contents.name: Bodegas Laxas Albarino (SP)
contents.description: A clean, bright, straw-yellow wine with greenish sparkles. Presents an intense aroma on the nose, perfectly blending fruity and flowery notes, highlightling apples and fruits with stone (Apricot). On the mouth, the freshness typical of the Albarino wine is noted, with a low, perfectly balanced acidity perfectly blanced with the structure and body of the wine. Tasty, sweet, and glyceric.

contents.name: 2009 Sauvignon Blanc "Unique" Domaine Salvard (FR)
contents.description: Vibrant citrus flavors and excellent minerality highlight this 100% single estate sauvignon blanc from the Loire valley. Typical of many Loire whites it has extremely fresh, lively, citrusy aromatics as well as an underlying, clean, flinty minerality quality that lingers for quite some time on the palate. It also has a very refreshing high acidity. Not surprisingly, this high toned, dry white is tailor-made for serving with any shellfish, and is a perfect foil against most creamy cheeses such as chevre.

contents.name: 2008 i Stefanini Monte de Toni Soave (IT)
contents.description: This is a cru - "Monte de Toni" - named for a tenant farmer who worked this vineyard decades ago. Aroma characterized by pear and plum followed by floral notes such as hawthorn and elder, finishing with delicate fruit. The flavors are one with the perfumes, with a long finish. This wine has a definite and pleasing minerality.

contents.name: 2008 St. Feur Viognier Triennes (FR)
contents.description: Sainte Fleur is explosive on the nose with apricot, honeysuckle and honey aromas. It has great power and intensity, combined with a beautiful balance between richness, acidity and minerality.

contents.name: 2010 Bordeaux Blanc Ducasse (FR)
contents.description: Made from 60% semillion, 35% sauvignon, and 5% muscadelle harvested from 50-80 year old vines, it is scintillanting golden in hue with a striking nose of white peach, magnolia blossomm a hint of lemon and mineral. The flavors follow through with what the nose promises, and there is a nice Semillion lushness lifted by the sauvignon blanc acidity.

contents.name: Domaine de Bernier Chardonnay (FR)
contents.description: High-toned with citrus, apple and a trace of vanilla on the bouquet. Medium-bodied with creamy-textured, focused fruit; lively and crisp acidity on the palate, and a steely, mineral finish. Pairs well with shellfish or curry.

contents.name: 2010 Riesling Graff Graacher Himmelreich Spatlese (GER)
contents.description: This lovely mosel riesling has a bouquet and flavor profile reminiscent of lime, apricots and citrus fruit. Sweet, but crisp. A perfect match with seafood, salads and spicy cuisine.

contents.name: 2009 Gruner Veltliner "Heiligenstein" Hirsch (AUS)
contents.description: "Pale green-yellow. Crisp apple, marjoram and a hint of orange zest on the nose. Compact and firm on the palate, with fresh pear and green apple flavors. Lively acidity adds a racy edge to this intense wine. Apple, herbs and pepper linger long on the finish of the very appetizing wine."

contents.name: 2010 Riesling Dragonstone Leitz (GER)
contents.description: "Luscious yet tart peach, cherry, and rhubarb are seem suffused with salt, crushed stone, and shrimp shell savor in this bright, invigorating, irresistibly enticing and far from simple riesling. Hints of inner mouth floral perfume and the piquancy of peach pit add futher depth.

contents.name: 2009 Cote du Rhone Laurence Ferand (FR)
contents.description: A blend of 80% grenache and 20% Syrah. A big, beefy cotes du rhone with abundant notes of grilled herbs, beef blood, black currants, sweet kirch, plums and Asian spices, it possesses lovely fruit, medium body, outstanding ripeness as well as texture and a heady finish.

contents.name: 2007 Brotte Cote du Rhone Villages Cairanne (FR)
contents.description: Complex aromas of small black fruits and leather. Spicy on the palate with notes of black pepper. Elegant tannins and a persistent finish of toasted flavors.

contents.name: Pinot Noir Domaine du Prieure Bourgogne (FR)
contents.description: Lightly oaked, light bodied, a good wine to complement light meats, roast porks, coq au vin, as well as duck and goose.

contents.name: Langhe Rosso Matot (IT)
contents.description: Matot‎ wines are usually Ruby-red in color. Matot is noted for its supple body and its elegant perfumes, which can include scents of over-ripe cherries, blackberries, and ripe plum. Foor pairings. This wine goes well with all kind pasta dishes. Braised stewed and roast red meat and game, as well as stewed and grilled meats or vegetables.

contents.name: 2008 Garnacha El Chapparel (SP)
contents.description: "El Chapparel" shapes up that way too. IT has great fresh red fruitiness, but almost no tannin and a great lush mouthfeel - not heavy or wieghty. It would love a chili in the fridge and it could easily handle some grilled skirt steak with a little salsa verde and avocado. Fresh red fruitness, but almost no tannin and a great lush mouthfeel, not heavy or weighty. Good with skirt steak.

contents.name: 2009 Carpineto Dogajolo Red (IT)
contents.description: Dogajolo combines the power and deep colors of a young wine, the elegance and balance given by wood-aging, as well as a fruity and fragrant bouquet. Grapes; sangiovese and cabernet sauvignon. Vinification technique: the two grape varieties are vinified seperately, since they ripen at different times.

contents.name: 2010 Cotes du Rhone St. Cosme (FR)
contents.description: Made from 100% cool climate Syrah from the sector of gard, which is well-known for its favorable terroir for Syrah, the tank-aged 2009 cotes du rhone exhibits a deep ruby purple hu along with loads give an ample, richly-flavoured finish.

contents.name: Chateau La Nerthe Chateauneuf du Pape (FR)
2007 Valdisanti IGT Tolaini (IT)
contents.description: Youthful, rich dark fruit, berry and cassis aromas meld with notable French oas spice. On the palate, valdisanti is full-bodied with deep but reserved fruit flavors framed by rich oak.

contents.description: Cucumber infused vodka with fresh mint, splash of soda, sweet and sour, sugared rim

contents.name: Blueberry Lemon Drop
contents.description: Smirnoff blueberry, fresh lemon, oregon blueberries, splash of sweet and sour, splash of lemonade, sugared rim

contents.name: Grapefruit Nirvana
contents.description: Finlandia grapefruit vodka with all natural agave nectar, muddled fresh grapefruit and a splash of fresh squeezed lemonade

options.name: Voted most refreshing cocktail in seattle — 2012

contents.name: Imperfect “Scratch” Margarita
contents.description: El jimador 100% agave reposado tequila, cointreau, major lime squeeze, salted rim

contents.name: Orange Mojito
contents.description: Captain morgan spiced rum with fresh oranges and mint, sweet and sour, splash of soda

contents.name: Our Famous Bloody Bloody Mary
contents.description: Housemade infused vodka with demitri’s all–natural bloody mary seasoning garnished with two jumbo prawns.“Life is too short for bland Marys.” — quote from Kelly Mitchell, west seattle resident and “regular”

contents.name: Sparkling Cucumber Martini
contents.description: American harvest organic vodka from snake river, id, muddled cucumbers, fresh basil, agave nectar and a float of chandon brut classic

contents.name: Killer Cherry Mojito
contents.description: Mount gay silver rum with all natural tillen farms maraschino cherry juice muddled with fresh limes and mint, splash of soda, sugared rim — on the rocks

contents.name: Bell Hop
contents.description: Belvedere citrus vodka muddled with fresh lemons and limes, all natural agave nectar, splash of soda and lemon–lime soda — on the rocks

contents.name: Tito's Moscow Mule
contents.description: Tito’s​ handmade vodka with fresh limes and the original **** ‘n’ bull ginger beer served in a signature 100% copper mug

contents.name: 10 Cane Mojito
contents.description: 10 cane rum muddled with fresh limes and mint, sweet and sour, soda, sugared rim — on the rocks

contents.name: “Belvedere Unfiltered” Diamond Martini
contents.description: Luxury polish vodka made from 100% “single estate” dankowskie diamond rye, unfiltered for purity, served with bleu cheese stuffed olives

contents.name: Mai Tai
contents.description: Mount gay black barrel rum, cointreau, lime, pineapple and orange juices, float myers’s dark rum

contents.name: Our Long Island Iced Tea
contents.description: Tito’s handmade vodka, mount gay black barrel rum and deep eddy sweet tea vodka with lemons, lemonade and cola

contents.text: Our Woodford reserve personal selection small batch bourbon

contents.name: Our Manhattan
contents.description: With a splash of blood orange bitters and martini and Rossi sweet vermouth, shaken and served “up”

contents.name: Woodford Reserve “on the Rock”
contents.description: Simply served straight with a slow melting custom frozen ice ball

contents.text: Each year duke travels to Louisville KY to personally blend our own batch of this unique, one–of–a–kind bourbons with master distiller Chris morris.
West coast wines is our focus: washington, oregon and california. We like to think of them as the most unique and diverse growing areas in the world.

contents.name: Chardonnay 14 Hands
contents.description: Columbia valley. Bright, crisp, flavors and aromas of melon, apple and pear. A classic washington chardonnay

contents.name: Chardonnay Sonoma–Cutrer
contents.description: Sonoma​ county. One of America’s favorite white wines. Clean, tropical fruit, great balance, light vanilla oak finish

contents.name: Riesling Chateau Ste. Michelle
contents.description: Columbia valley. Classic wa riesling characters of juicy peach, ripe pear, melon, subtle mineral notes

contents.name: White Blend Waterbrook Mélange Blanc
contents.description: Columbia valley. This easy drinking blend can stand by itself or pair great with any of our signature seafood dishes

contents.name: Pinot Grigio Rex Goliath
contents.description: California.​ Bright, juicy citrus and apple flavors, pear and honeydew aromas and balanced acidity

contents.name: Pinot Gris King Estate Acrobat
contents.description: Oregon. Balanced and crisp, tangerine, lemon, pineapple, clean finish. Solid wine from our neighbors

contents.name: Sauvignon Blanc Simi
contents.description: Sonoma county. 130+ years of wine making, this medium bodied wine is crisp with mineral notes and snappy acidity

contents.name: Viognier Cline
contents.description: Sonoma coast. Lush mouthfeel, crisp finish and mouth watering acidity

contents.name: Cabernet Sauvignon Chateau Ste. Michelle Indian Wells
contents.description: Columbia valley. This lush wine reveals fruit–forward blackberry and chrry flavors and dark fruit aromas

contents.name: Cabernet Sauvignon Newton
contents.description: Napa valley. Sustainable grown, this lush cabernet boasts notes of blackberry, black currants and herbs

contents.name: Merlot 14 Hands
contents.description: Columbia valley. Bright, juicy fruit flavors complemented by refined, velvety tannins. Our #1 selling red wine!

contents.name: Red Blend Fidelitas M100
contents.description: Columbia valley. Very drinkable. Well balanced with soft tannins and a plush palate

contents.name: Pinot Noir Estancia
contents.description: Monterey county. Rich and creamy with ripe plum, blueberry and black cherry leading to a smooth, lingering finish

contents.name: Pinot Noir King Estate Acrobat
contents.description: Oregon. The smell of bing cherries gives this wine a delightful bouquet with smooth tannins and spice

contents.name: Malbec Alamos
contents.description: Mendoza,​ argentina. Packs a punch up front, rich, dark fruit leads to a warm fuzzy finish

contents.name: Sparkling Chandon Brut Classic
contents.description: California. Centuries–old champagne wine making methods produce this dry, fresh sparkling wine with a long, elegant finish

contents.name: Sparkling Korbel
contents.description: California. Bright, crisp, bubbly and dry. A classic sparkling wine (187ml)

contents.name: Prosecco Zonin
contents.description: Italy. Beautiful soft bubbles that dance on your palate (187ml)

contents.name: Prosecco La Marca
contents.description: Italy. Fresh and clean with hints of honey, citrus and green apple

contents.text: Below are some of our favorite, smaller, ‘boutique’ wineries in washington. Handcrafted in small quantities, with high quality fruit from vineyards using sustainable farming methods. Each local winemaker makes a distinctive style of wine that we feel are the perfect complement to our food. Remarkable wines and unbelievable values.

contents.name: Darby “Le Deuce”
contents.description: Columbia valley. a viognier and Roussanne blend loaded with notes of citrus, white peach, honey and orange blossom

options.name: “Voted best white Rhone blend in washington” — seattle magazine

contents.name: JM Cellars Sauvignon Blanc
contents.description: Red mountain. the grapes are from the esteemed klipsun vineyard. Crisp and easy to drink, this sauvignon blanc has tropical flavors and no oak. enjoy!

contents.name: Va Piano Sauvignon Blanc
contents.description: Columbia valley. Owner / wine maker Justin Wylie strives for balance in everything. Crisp and juicy with racy acidity, this wine pairs great with shellfish and seafood

contents.name: Sparkman Cellars Chardonnay Columbia
contents.description: Valley.​ 100% chardonnay. Crisp, clean and balanced, lumiere explodes on the palate with an avalanche of wild tropical fruits, creamy richness and finishes with its trademark minerality

options.name: 2011 wine and spirits top 100 winery in the world

contents.name: Novelty Hill Viognier
contents.description: Columbia valley. Stillwater creek vineyard fruit sourced under acclaimed wine maker mike Januik. A lively wine with balanced acidity and leaves a polished impression

contents.name: JM Cellars “Bramble Bump”
contents.description: Columbia valley. Seven different grape varietals blended together to make one heck of a red. A labor of love from a woodinville neighbor the wines are first–class and reasonably priced.

contents.name: Va Piano Estate Cabernet
contents.description: Columbia valley. Showcases chocolate and rich black cherry with well balanced tannins and a long smooth finish

contents.name: Sparkman Cellars Pinot Noir
contents.description: Eola–amity hills. This elegant, savory pinot noir has a nose of crushed roses with a silky and firm texture and light and delicate on the palate

contents.name: Fidelitas Cabernet Sauvignon
contents.description: Columbia valley. Charlie hoppes is one of the finest wine makers in our state. This cabernet is a full bodied, sensuous display of his craft

contents.name: Mark Ryan “the Dissident”
contents.description: Columbia valley. This wine, made up of six grape varietals, is remarkably elegant, showcasing focused, balanced acidity and fine, polished tannins

options.name: 2011 wine maker of the year — seattle magazine

contents.name: Darby “the Dark Side” Syrah Walla Walla
contents.description: Valley.​ Silky smooth with black cherry, chocolate and spice. A big syrah, great balance and depth

contents.name: Guardian Cellars “Chalk Line”
contents.description: Columbia valley. Police detective during the day, wine maker at night jerry riener offers this wine with nice acidity, a full mouth–feel, and lingering fruit on the palate. A blend of six different grape varietals, and consistently voted in the top 100 in washington state

contents.name: Delille “D2”
contents.description: Columbia valley. Named after the famed d2 highway in bordeaux, this predominantly merlot and cabernet sauvignon blend explodes with chocolate and cherry flavors accented by aromas of coffee, floral notes, and dark fruit

options.name: Top 100 wines of wa — seattle met, 2012

contents.name: Januik Merlot
contents.description: Columbia valley. Mike Januik was head wine maker at chateau Ste michelle for ten years and also named one of the world’s ten “masters of merlot” by wine enthusiast. this tasty merlot is well structured and medium bodied with raspberry, vanilla and spice notes.

contents.description: Coconut cream soup with chicken, lime leaves, lemon grass, galangal (thai ginger), and mushroom. Topped with cilantro.

contents.name: D-12. Tom Yum (Hot and Sour Soup with Lime Juice)
contents.description: A moderately spicy soup with lemon grass, mushroom, chili paste, cilantro, lime leaves, tomatoe, green onion, and sweet basil. Served in hot pot.

contents.text: in summer, when it’s too hot to stay indoors, I think of the roadside dhabas in Delhi & elsewhere, where kababs & butter dal are served at rickety tables w/ wooden benches on sidewalks & open courtyards, where cooling breezes help stimulate the appetite & make everything taste better

contents.name: Dal Makhani

contents.name: Baingan Bharta

contents.name: Vegetarian Seekh Kababs

contents.description: A German tavern favorite! smoked sausage served with German mustard and roggenbrot.

contents.description: Marinated beets, gorgonzola, and walnuts. Served over mixed greens with balsamic vinaigrette.

contents.description: Veal and pork bockwurst, sliced and topped with curry ketchup.

contents.name: Brezel Sandwich
contents.description: Thinly sliced German cervelat and jagdwurst with mixed greens, red onions, cheddar, and swiss on a morning star pretzel roll. Toasted and topped with our horseradish aioli and stone ground mustard.

contents.name: Bratwurst Sandwich
contents.description: Bavarian meat bratwurst served in a frisches brot chen with sauerkraut, curried ketchup, and German mustard. Served with an imported German pickle.

contents.description: Thin sliced Bavarian meat cold cuts cervalat and jagdwurst, swiss and cheddar, sliced granny smith apples, radishes, roggenbrot, and German mustard.

contents.name: Bratwurst Mit Sauerkraut
contents.description: Bavarian meat bratwurst served over sauerkraut with roggenbrot, German mustard, and gewurzgurken.

contents.name: German Wurst Sampler
contents.description: Knackwurst and bratwurst served over sauerkraut with roggenbrot, German mustard, and gewurzgurken.

contents.name: Kassler Rippchen Mit Sauerkraut
contents.description: Smoked pork‏ tenderloin served over sauerkraut with roggenbrot, German mustard, and gewurzgurken. Just like Oma made!

contents.description: Hearty cream of potato soup. Featuring baked potatoes and bacon.

contents.text: Roggenbrot = rye bread – gewurzgurken = pickle
